verses.verse: Hiram <S%H2438><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> and cedar <S%H730><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> and masons, <S%H7023><s%> and carpenters, <S%H2796><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> him a house. <S%H1004><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> perceived <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had established <S%H3559><s%> him king <S%H4428><s%> over Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> was exalted on <S%H5375><s%> high, <S%H4605><s%> for his people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s sake.

David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> more wives <S%H802><s%> at Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of more sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H3205><s%> whom he had in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> Shammua, <S%H8051><s%> and Shobab, <S%H7727><s%> Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> and Solomon, <S%H8010><s%>
and Ibhar, <S%H2984><s%> and Elishua, <S%H474><s%> and Elpelet, <S%H467><s%>
and Nogah, <S%H5052><s%> and Nepheg, <S%H5298><s%> and Japhia, <S%H3309><s%>
and Elishama, <S%H476><s%> and Beeliada, <S%H1182><s%> and Eliphelet. <S%H467><s%>

When the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> was anointed <S%H4886><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> David: <S%H1732><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it, <S%H3318><s%> and went out against them. <S%H6440><s%>
Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had come <S%H935><s%> and made a raid <S%H6584><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Shall I go up <S%H5927><s%> against the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%> Will you deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into my hand? <S%H3027><s%>" Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5927><s%> "Go up; for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

So they came up <S%H5927><s%> to Baal Perazim, <S%H1188><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them there; <S%H1732><s%> and David said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has broken <S%H6555><s%> my enemies <S%H341><s%> by my hand, <S%H3027><s%> like the breach <S%H6556><s%> of waters. <S%H4325><s%> Therefore they called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Baal Perazim. <S%H1188><s%>
They left <S%H5800><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%> there; <S%H1732><s%> and David gave commandment, <S%H559><s%> and they were burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>
The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> yet again <S%H3254><s%> made a raid <S%H6584><s%> in the valley. <S%H6010><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> again of God; <S%H430><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5927><s%> "You shall not go up after <S%H310><s%> them. <S%H5437><s%> Turn away from them, <S%H935><s%> and come on them over against <S%H4136><s%> the mulberry trees. <S%H1057><s%>

It shall be, <S%H8085><s%> when you hear the sound <S%H6963><s%> of marching <S%H6807><s%> in the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mulberry trees, <S%H1057><s%> that then you shall go out <S%H3318><s%> to battle; <S%H4421><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> has gone out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to strike <S%H5221><s%> the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>"

David <S%H1732><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him: <S%H5221><s%> and they struck the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> from Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> even to Gezer. <S%H1507><s%>

The fame <S%H8034><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> into all lands; <S%H776><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5414><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of him on all nations. <S%H1471><s%>
